<S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Cause To Offend <S%G4624><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3398><s%> These Little Ones <S%G5130><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Me, <S%G1691><s%> It Is Profitable <S%G4851><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Should Be Hung <S%G2910><s%> A Millstone <S%G3458><s%> Turned By An Ass <S%G3684><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5137><s%> His Neck, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Be Sunk <S%G2670><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Depth <S%G3989><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%>

<S%G3708><s%> See <S%G3361><s%> Ye Despise Not <S%G2706><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3398><s%> Of These Little Ones, <S%G5130><s%> <S%G3004><s%> For I Say <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> Their Angels <S%G846><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> <S%G1223><s%> Continually <S%G3956><s%> Behold <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of My Father <S%G3450><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>
<S%G2064><s%> For Is Come <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> To Save <S%G4982><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Lost. <S%G622><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> What <S%G5213><s%> Think Ye? <S%G1380><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> There Should Be <S%G1096><s%> To Any <S%G5100><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> A Hundred <S%G1540><s%> Sheep, <S%G4263><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Gone Astray <S%G4105><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them, Does He <S%G846><s%> Not, <S%G3780><s%> Having Left <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Ninety - Nine <S%G1768><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountains, <S%G3735><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> Seek <S%G2212><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Gone Astray? <S%G4105><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not The <S%G2076><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Should Perish <S%G622><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3398><s%> Of These Little Ones. <S%G5130><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Sin <S%G264><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Thy Brother, <S%G4675><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Reprove <S%G1651><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Between <S%G3342><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Alone. <S%G3441><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> He Will Hear, <S%G191><s%> Thou Hast Gained <S%G2770><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Thy Brother. <S%G4675><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But If <S%G3361><s%> He Will Not Hear, <S%G191><s%> Take <S%G3880><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> Besides <S%G2089><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Two, <S%G1417><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Upon The <S%G1909><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Of Two <S%G1417><s%> Witnesses <S%G3144><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Of Three <S%G5140><s%> May Stand <S%G2476><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Word. <S%G4487><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> He Fail To Listen To <S%G3878><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Tell It <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly. <S%G1577><s%> <S%G1437><s%> And If <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> He Fail To Listen To, <S%G3878><s%> Let Him <S%G2077><s%> Be To Thee <S%G4671><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heathen <S%G1482><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherer. <S%G5057><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatsoever <S%G1437><s%> Ye Shall Bind <S%G1210><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Bound <S%G1210><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven; <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatsoever <S%G1437><s%> Ye Shall Loose <S%G3089><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Loosed <S%G3089><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> May Agree <S%G4856><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Matter <S%G4229><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> They Shall Ask, <S%G154><s%> It Shall Be Done <S%G1096><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G3757><s%> For Where <S%G1063><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> My <S%G1699><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Am I 1510 V-PXI-1S In The 1722 PREP Midst 3319 A-DSN Of Them. 846 P-GPM

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Come <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> How Often <S%G4212><s%> Shall Sin <S%G264><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brother <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Forgive <S%G863><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Seven Times? <S%G2034><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Say Not <S%G3004><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Seven Times, <S%G2034><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Seventy Times <S%G1441><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Has Become Like <S%G3666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> To A Man <S%G444><s%> A King, <S%G935><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2309><s%> Would <S%G4868><s%> Take Account <S%G3056><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondmen. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G756><s%> And Having Begun <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> To Reckon, <S%G4868><s%> There Was Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Debtor <S%G3781><s%> Of Ten Thousand <S%G3463><s%> Talents. <S%G5007><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> <S%G2192><s%> But Not Having <S%G1161><s%> He Wherewith <S%G846><s%> To Pay, <S%G591><s%> Commanded <S%G2753><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> His Lord <S%G846><s%> To Be Sold, <S%G4097><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> As Much As <S%G3745><s%> , He Had, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Payment To Made. <S%G591><s%>

Having Fallen Down <S%G4098><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Did Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> , Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Have Patience <S%G3114><s%> ' With <S%G1909><s%> Me, <S%G1698><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> I Will Pay. <S%G591><s%>

<S%G4697><s%> And Having Been Moved With Compassion <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Of That <S%G1565><s%> Released <S%G630><s%> , Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Loan <S%G1156><s%> Forgave <S%G863><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1831><s%> But Having Gone Out <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> That Bondman <S%G1565><s%> Found <S%G2147><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fellow Bondmen <S%G4889><s%> Of His, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Owed <S%G3784><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Hundred <S%G1540><s%> Denarii, <S%G1220><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seized <S%G2902><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Throttled Him, <S%G4155><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Pay <S%G591><s%> <S%G3427><s%> Me <S%G3739><s%> What <S%G5100><s%> Thou Owest. <S%G3784><s%>

Having Fallen Down <S%G4098><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4889><s%> His Fellow Bondman <S%G846><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet <S%G846><s%> Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Have Patience <S%G3114><s%> ' With <S%G1909><s%> Me, <S%G1698><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3956><s%> I Will Pay <S%G591><s%> Thee. <S%G4671><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Would Not, <S%G2309><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Having Gone <S%G565><s%> He Cast <S%G906><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> He Should Pay <S%G591><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Owing. <S%G3784><s%>

Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4889><s%> His Fellow Bondmen <S%G846><s%> What Things <S%G3588><s%> Had Taken Place, <S%G1096><s%> Were Grieved <S%G3076><s%> Greatly, <S%G4970><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone <S%G2064><s%> Narrated <S%G1285><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> To Their Lord <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Had Taken Place. <S%G1096><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> His Lord <S%G846><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Wicked, <S%G4190><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Debt <S%G3782><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> I Forgave <S%G863><s%> Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Since <S%G1893><s%> Thou Besoughtest <S%G3870><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> Did It Not Behove <S%G1163><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Have Pitied <S%G1653><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4889><s%> Thy Fellow Bondman, <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Thee 4571 P-2AS Had Pitied? 1653 V-AAI-1S

And <S%G2532><s%> Being Angry <S%G3710><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> His Lord <S%G846><s%> Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Tormentors, <S%G930><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> He Should Pay <S%G591><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Was Owing <S%G3784><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenly <S%G2032><s%> Will Do <S%G4160><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> Ye Forgive <S%G863><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Offences <S%G3900><s%> Their. <S%G846><s%>
